name: Lone crafter
description:
ADD a fixed version(fixed the rocket  taking so long to appear) .

NOTE:  The machine works auto when it's fixed and player is NEAR, and will start creating light bot(count =20) and the rocket(count=200).

Craft ,loot,survive until the rocket is created.

survive until the rocket is created(press x to enter).

controls:

x to loot/attack/scavenge.

c to open/close craft menu.

x on workbech to open/close menu.

x on tent to sleep.

x to pick up pickaxe.

check how to play on game for more help.
